org.sxb.kit

クラス PropKit

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sxb.kit.PropKit

  • public class PropKit
extends java.lang.Object
    属性资源读取类 PropKit. PropKit can load properties file from CLASSPATH or File object.

    • メソッドの概要

    • メソッドの詳細

      • use

        public static Prop use(java.lang.String fileName)
        Using the properties file. It will loading the properties file if not loading.
        関連項目:
        use(String, String)

      • use

        public static Prop use(java.lang.String fileName,
                       java.lang.String encoding)
        Using the properties file. It will loading the properties file if not loading.

        Example:
        PropKit.use("config.txt", "UTF-8");
        PropKit.use("other_config.txt", "UTF-8");

        String userName = PropKit.get("userName");
        String password = PropKit.get("password");

        userName = PropKit.use("other_config.txt").get("userName");
        password = PropKit.use("other_config.txt").get("password");

        PropKit.use("com/sxb/config_in_sub_directory_of_classpath.txt");

        パラメータ:
        fileName - the properties file's name in classpath or the sub directory of classpath
        encoding - the encoding

      • use

        public static Prop use(java.io.File file)
        Using the properties file bye File object. It will loading the properties file if not loading.
        関連項目:
        use(File, String)

      • use

        public static Prop use(java.io.File file,
                       java.lang.String encoding)
        Using the properties file bye File object. It will loading the properties file if not loading.

        Example:
        PropKit.use(new File("/var/config/my_config.txt"), "UTF-8");
        Strig userName = PropKit.use("my_config.txt").get("userName");

        パラメータ:
        file - the properties File object
        encoding - the encoding
